question: The police of which city has recently launched robot CYBIRA?
explanation: The Visakhapatnam police launched a first-of-its-kind humanoid cop. The robot has been placed at Maharanipeta police station. A start-up company Robo Coupler Private Limited has designed this robot \'CYBIRA\' (cyber security interactive robotic agent) for registering and disposing of complaints at police station in an effective manner. The robot will take complaints automatically through voice recording or manually. A total number of 13 cameras have been installed in this robot.
